thread.title: Genesis Energy, L.P. to Participate in Citigroup MLP/Midstream Infrastructure Conference
thread.title_full: Genesis Energy, L.P. to Participate in Citigroup MLP/Midstream Infrastructure Conference

title: Genesis Energy, L.P. to Participate in Citigroup MLP/Midstream Infrastructure Conference
text:
Microsoft Word - 2015-08-18 CITI Conference 
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE August 18, 2015 GENESIS ENERGY, L.P. TO PARTICIPATE IN CITIGROUP MLP/MIDSTREAM INFRASTRUCTURE CONFERENCE 
August 18, 2015 - (Houston, TX) - Genesis Energy, L.P. (NYSE:GEL) announced today that Grant E. Sims, CEO, will participate in the Citigroup MLP/Midstream Infrastructure Conference on August 19 and 20, 2015 in Las Vegas. The Partnership's latest presentation materials are available and may be downloaded by visiting the Partnership's website at www.genesisenergy.com under "Presentations" under the Investors tab. Genesis Energy, L.P. is a diversified midstream energy master limited partnership headquartered in Houston, Texas. Genesis' operations include onshore and offshore pipeline transportation, refinery services, marine transportation and supply and logistics. Genesis' operations are primarily located in Texas, Louisiana, Arkansas, Mississippi, Alabama, Florida, Wyoming and the Gulf of Mexico. Contact: Genesis Energy, L.P. Bob Deere Chief Financial Officer (713) 860-2516
